description:
Word-finding tool to query words based on certain criteria, such as "Rhymes with [your word]", "Sounds like [you word]", "Is related to [your word]".

Here is an example implementation:
Run-mode - https://datamuse.bubbleapps.io/version-test
Editor - https://bubble.is/page?name=index&id=datamuse&tab=tabs-1
name: Word Finder
plugin_instructions:
See link to example implementation: https://bubble.is/page?name=index&id=datamuse&tab=tabs-1

Steps:
1. Install this plugin
2. Set a data source (e.g. of text or repeating group) to “Insert dynamic data”—>”Get data from external API”—> Data Muse…
3. Enter values for the criteria you’d like to search by (e.g. Rhymes with [Blue] is related to [Cow])
4. If you don’t care about a criteria, leave it empty
